message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially suggesting a price of $2,300,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.

Alice, thank you for the offer, but $2,300,000 is significantly higher than my budget. I'm willing to offer $1,200,000 for the product, reflecting its value to me. I believe this is a reasonable starting point for negotiation.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,200,000 is significantly below its true market value. I've received considerable interest from other parties. I'm willing to come down to $2,000,000. This is a firm offer, reflecting my best judgment of the product's worth.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $2,000,000 is still more than I can afford. I'm willing to go up to $1,700,000. I believe this is a fair price given the value of the product and my budget.
